songs.title: Like A Thug
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Young Thug]
Cash Cash
Thugger Thugger
Longway Longway
Uhh
My-my-my-my-my-my brudda made this track!

[Hook: Young Thug]
Live life like a thug (thuggin')
Live life like a thug (bussin')
Sell drugs like a thug (serve)
Pop slugs like a thug (bah)
Fuck hoes like a thug (fuck all 'em)
Rock golds like a thug (sick gold)
Slime at shows like thug (slatt)
Nigga know you a thug (blatt)
Peewee Longway! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Racks the long way! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Chips the long way! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way! (Longway)
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way (Thugger)

[Verse 1: Young Thug]
Live life like a thug (Thugger)
Thugger go & just paste it
Dope white like an apron
Ridin round like a mason'
Blowing them bands on lil shorty (bands)
Mink coat no 4-5's
F&N's no 4-5's
If I ain't got the strap, bitch I got a knife
I'm just living my life
I ain't tryna earn no stripes (no stripes)
Fuck her from the back all night (all night)
Then I'mma turn up like Ike (turn up, turn up)
Me and Longway busting down on lil features (what, what)
Me and Longway got bags of that reefer
Me and Longway got the same Mama no 'cita
Me and Longway turn the money here legal
Pull up on the Robins in front of racks
Nigga diamond black no cat
Milked a nigga 'fore he even hatched (BAM)
All my niggas yelling ratatat

[Hook: Young Thug]
Live life like a thug (thuggin')
Live life like a thug (bussin')
Sell drugs like a thug (serve)
Pop slugs like a thug (bah)
Fuck hoes like a thug (fuck all 'em)
Rock golds like a thug (sick gold)
Slime at shows like thug (slatt)
Nigga know you a thug (blatt)
Peewee Longway! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Racks the long way! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Chips the long way! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way! (Longway)
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way (Longway!)

[Verse 2: Peewee Longway & Young Thug]
Ride on yo bitch like she Kesha from Belly
Thug Life tatted on my belly (aye)
Jumpin' off the porch, shawty say he wanna be a thug
Reason why he killed Nick Cannon (sheesh!)
Trap out the bando, got big work, colossal (ah, ah)
He front me the tacos, I bring back the nachos (ah, ya)
I fuck with El Chapo and Pablo a Pablo (yee, yee)
I told 'em I got the pure dope (woo, woo, sheesh!)
I got racks the long way, heard what the song say
I'm sipping on lean like a Bombay (lean!)
Gas bags on the runway, sendin' 'em andale
And the mailman coming down the one way (skrrrrt)
We toastin, overdosin, 'cause we got grosses
The package came in on a Sunday (sheesh)
I told you cockroaches Tony fucked Sosa
Don't none of you tell me what the fuck to say (yeesh!)
Calif... (yee!) Ca-California Rarri I'm in LA
The bitches be screaming out Longway Longway
Thuggin' in West Hollywood to the Bay (sheesh!)
Thumbin' through Benjamins wit my ese (woah)
Overnight shippin the Frito-Lay (oh)
You know that I hate to demonstrate (what?)
Keep a bitch like Rih-Rih, call her bae (yeesh)

[Hook: Young Thug]
Live life like a thug (thuggin')
Live life like a thug (bussin')
Sell drugs like a thug (serve)
Pop slugs like a thug (bah)
Fuck hoes like a thug (fuck all 'em)
Rock golds like a thug (sick gold)
Slime at shows like thug (slatt)
Nigga know you a thug (blatt)
Peewee Longway! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Racks the long way! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Chips the long way! (Longway, Longway)
Live life like a thug
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way! (Longway)
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way
Live life like a thug
Flips the long way
